description: In Colorino, kids learn their colors as they play. Using colorful pegs, kids will learn colors while placing large, easy-to-handle pieces to complete one of six adorable double-sided pictures. They can also use their imagination to color in the black and white drawings. Learn colors as you play. In Colorino, kids will use vibrant, easy-to-handle pegs to complete one of twelve pictures. The extra-large pegs are easy to place on the pegboard, which helps strengthen fine motor skills and improves sensory perception. Additionally, kids can use their creativity to color in the black and white drawings. Ravensburger's toys, games, and puzzles have encouraged discovery of what really matters through play for over 130 years. As a family-owned business, Ravensburger has built a reputation as a trusted brand for parents and children alike.
